Package peer

Class PeerImp.FileQueueThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • peer.MyThread
        • peer.PeerImp.FileQueueThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    PeerImp
    public static class PeerImp.FileQueueThread
extends MyThread
    Thread used to handle the download threads of a single file (or chunk) Its job is to add the download threads to the queue and wait for them all to finish, nad finally write the file to the disk

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void check_rebuildability()
      If a file is a chunk, check if it's possible to rebuild the whole file If it is possible, rebuild the whole file and delete remaining chunks
      void create_slice_array()
      Creates the array where the bytes will be saved
      java.lang.String get_progress()
      Get the number of threads that have finished, and the total number in a string
      boolean isFinished()
      Check if the thread has finished, which means that all downloads have finished
      void run()
      Creates all downloads and adds them to the queue
      void write_file()
      Write the bytes in a file, and if it's a chunk, rebuild if possible

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileQueueThread

        public FileQueueThread​(PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread file_thread,
                       PeerImp.GlobalQueueThread download_thread,
                       java.util.List<Manager> seed_managers,
                       java.lang.String hash_to_download,
                       java.lang.String file_location,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> friend_hashes,
                       ContentManager manager,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Constructor for a file thread
        Parameters:
        file_thread - Thread managing all file threads
        download_thread - Thread managing all download threads
        seed_managers - All the managers that own the file
        hash_to_download - Hash of the file we want to download
        file_location - Location where to save this file
        friend_hashes - If the file is a chunk, all the hashes needed to rebuild original file
        manager - The manager of this PeerImp
        name - The name of the whole file, if it needs to be rebuilt

      • check_rebuildability

        public void check_rebuildability()
